verbs.description: BEIJING ( AP ) — [ARG0: A top North Korean official] [V: headed] [ARG1: to New York] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [ARGM-PRP: for talks aimed at salvaging a summit between Kim Jong Un and President Donald Trump on the future of Ki]
